pages.text: The$(thing)spores$()I planted have grown, and I have completed my first harvest. It appears that I was right; this thing I have found is$(thing)a plant and a fungus living in harmony$(). I believe I shall call it $(item)Sporebrush$().
The spores covering the deep blue leaves of this plant are still shining so brightly. They must be full to the brim with energy. I should$(item)bundle$()some leaves together for better storage.

pages.title: Campfire Cooking
pages.text: Perhaps $(thing)burning these bundles on a open fire$()might do something...$(br)The sporebrush should burn$(thing)quite slowly$(), but about$(thing)a minute$()should be enough to notice a result.
